title: Luca Lays it Down
description: Luca Konig marches to the beat of his own drum - in both life, and in love. Raised in Milan, Italy by a hardworking single mother, he knows hardship well. When a music internship in New York is offered to him he jumps at the chance of a better life for himself, and for his mother.After losing a drumming competition out of state, Luca heads back to New York even more determined to focus on a career in the music industry.What he doesnâ€™t plan on is sexy fireman Gage Maxwell inadvertently turning his life upside down, leaving him uncertain of his true desires! When it comes to his heart, will Luca keep playing hard and fast or is he finally ready to lay it down for just one guy?
author: Alexandra  Reed
